name: Serious Head
description:
Once upon a time there was a programmer, and trouble came to him.
Adventure of a serious geek head, through labyrinths with traps.
8 pair of very difficult levels + 1 secret

Control:
Start a new game: ENTER
Game loading: R
Quit the game and exit to the menu: Q
Control: ARROWS
Expand to full screen: F

Joystick support is active in the offline version
Start a new game: 1 button
Game loading: 2 button
End the game and exit to the menu: 3 button
Control: ARROWS
Expand to full screen: -

Very hard, run and push, take your time and do not hesitate.
